workflow.name: Extract ICP-targeted LinkedIn leads from post comments using Apify
workflow.description:
This workflow automates the process of extracting and qualifying leads from LinkedIn post comments based on your Ideal Customer Profile (ICP) criteria. It turns LinkedIn engagement into a structured, downloadable list of qualified leads‚Äîwithout manual review.

---

## Who‚Äôs this for

* Sales and business development teams generating outbound lead lists
* Marketing teams running LinkedIn engagement campaigns
* Recruiters sourcing candidates with specific job titles
* Operators who want to convert LinkedIn comments into actionable data

---

## What problem does this solve

Manually reviewing LinkedIn post comments to identify relevant prospects is slow, repetitive, and error-prone. This workflow automates the entire process‚Äîfrom scraping comments to enriching profiles and filtering by ICP‚Äîsaving hours of manual work and ensuring consistent results.

---

## What this workflow does

1. Collects a LinkedIn post URL and ICP criteria via a form
2. Scrapes post comments using Apify (supports up to 1,000 comments)
3. Deduplicates commenters and enriches profiles with LinkedIn data
4. Filters profiles by selected job titles and countries
5. Exports matched leads as a downloadable CSV file

---

## How to set up

1. Create an Apify account and generate an API key
2. Add your Apify credentials in n8n (**Settings ‚Üí Credentials ‚Üí Apify API**)
3. Execute the workflow and submit a LinkedIn post URL and ICP criteria

---

## Requirements

* Apify account with API access - Apify offers a free tier with $5 in monthly credits, which is enough to test this workflow on smaller LinkedIn posts

---

## How to customize the workflow

* Update job titles and target countries in the Form Trigger
* Increase pagination limits to support larger posts
* Replace CSV export with a CRM, Google Sheets, or database integration

workflow.name: Extract Target ICP Leads from LinkedIn Comments using Apify

parameters.content:
## 1. User Input Form
Collects the LinkedIn post URL and ICP filtering criteria (job titles and target countries) from the user.

## 2. Scrape Comments with Pagination
Fetches all comments from the LinkedIn post using Apify. Handles pagination automatically to retrieve up to 1,000 comments.

## 3. Deduplicate & Enrich Profiles
Removes duplicate commenters and enriches each unique profile with detailed LinkedIn data including job titles, location, and company information.

## 4. Filter & Export Leads
Filters enriched profiles against your ICP criteria and exports matching leads as a downloadable CSV file.

### ‚ö†Ô∏è API Costs
Apify charges per API call. Each profile enrichment is a separate call. Monitor your Apify usage to manage costs effectively.

parameters.formDescription: Extract LinkedIn profiles matching your target ICP from post comments. Fill in the LinkedIn post URL and select your target decision-maker job titles and countries.

parameters.content:
## LinkedIn ICP Lead Extractor

This workflow extracts qualified leads from LinkedIn post comments based on your Ideal Customer Profile (ICP) job titles and countries.

### How it works
1. Submit a LinkedIn post URL via the form
2. Select target job titles and countries
3. Comments are scraped and deduplicated
4. Each profile is enriched with detailed data
5. Profiles are filtered against your ICP criteria
6. Matching leads are exported as CSV

### Setup steps
- [ ] Create an Apify account at apify.com
- [ ] Add your Apify API credentials in n8n
- [ ] Click "Execute Workflow" to open the form
- [ ] Submit a LinkedIn post URL with your ICP criteria

### Requirements
- Apify account with API access (Free tier is available on Apify)

### Customization
- Modify job titles/countries in the Form Trigger
- Adjust pagination limits for larger posts
- Connect output to your CRM instead of CSV
